foreignObject.div: Unable to connect to all desktops
Unable to connect to a group of desktops
Check the status of each node
Identify and SSH into the problem node

Check the status of K3s by doing:
systemctl status k3s.service

Node is down or not reachable.
This suggests an internal networking issue, or need a reboot.
Check the firewall configuration, are the necessary ports open?
If this is a slave node, check connection to master
